TopicTitle: HOCgaming's THAT'S NO MOON! Base - Craft Submission Thread

Articles.Content:
The Chimera I and the Chimera II refueler/shuttlecraft by ThePsuedoMonkey

Both models have five seats, RTG power, computer backup, roving capability, a 1m tank of monopropellant, standard and junior docking ports, the mass-less landing gear, two large 1m tanks of fuel and a single LVN, which gives them a maximum of 5 landing/takeoff cycles.

The Chimera I: 13.58T, 31 parts, an initial TWR of 2.71, and a total dV of 6970 unloaded and 6700 with the four external seats occupied. HTOL design allows you to save a bit of fuel during landing by not killing all horizontal velocity, and during takeoff by accelerating with the rover wheels. An RTG is embedded inside the RCS tank, and a linear RCS port is attached to the command pod to make takeoff easier. https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B6828vVl_-ZodGxhWVhZTlFnYUk/edit?usp=sharing

The Chimera II: 13.79T, 39 parts, an initial TWR of 2.67 and a total dV of 6800 unloaded and 6530 with the four external seats occupied. VTOL design simplifies landings, gives more docking ports, and makes roving in IVA mode feel awesome. https://docs.google.com/file/d/0B6828vVl_-ZoM3VYMmRZUUdUU2M/edit?usp=sharing

Edited June 30, 2013 by ThePsuedoMonkey

Tricorne IIb

I've added an improved version of Tricorne IIb - now only 64 parts! (only fuel lines and few struts were changed, also a misplaced generator was relocated)

Adjusted version: http://www.fileswap.com/dl/eS8Fpdi1B/

P.S. Also a few more statistics:

Fuel capacity is 2170 liquid fuel

With full fuel it can land from 15km orbit with using just ~600 fuel and needs only ~280 fuel to get into 15km orbit (when taking off with total of 360 fuel), which means it can deliver over 1200 fuel at a time

Edited June 26, 2013 by norso

Name of Utility - BlueLink MoonShuttle

Screenshot - http://imgur.com/JUhUMjb

Total Mass of Utility - 27.47 Tons, 46 parts

Utility's .CRAFT file - http://www./download/koo9ma7e3tt5e8a/BlueLink_MoonShuttle.craft

Your Name - Narft

Extra Info - A moon shuttle with 4 LV-909 Engines, 1440 liquidfuel distributed over 4 tanks, 160 RCS, A top docking port for docking with the orbital station, 2 junior and 2 normal docking ports on the bottom for surface docking, 4 kerbal storage container and a RC-L01 Remote guidance unit to prevent kerbals from dying in the proces of launching it.

Name of craft: KAD9-6B-3 Viking (or just Viking for convenience's-sake)

Screen shot: http://imgur.com/rsUDmFD

Total mass and part count: 16.59 tonnes, 102 parts

Craft file: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/viking-mkt/

Creator's name: Dr Jellybeans MD

Extra information: The craft comes with both standard and junior docking ports. It can carry a maximum of nine Kerbals (including the pilot), and yes, I did take heavy inspiration and influences from the DR-4 Viking from Starship Troopers. This craft is best flown to the following soundtrack:

Hi, im bman2232, founder of BTech Industries...

Here at BTech Industries, we pride ourselves at helping people get places. so today i present to you... The Shuttl-er!

The Shuttl-er weighs in at a mere 27.69 tons with only 34 parts!!! it has a cosy hitchikers storage container kept warm by 4 RTG's ( they also power this shuttle). the Shuttl-er also comes with landing lights and a docking light (for those dark situations).

Some Action Groups:

1- toggle ladders

2- toggle landing lights

3- toggle docking light

4- toggle docking shield

Here are some pictures of the Shuttl-er:

On the Launch Pad:

On the Launch Pad at Night:

Some Cinematic Screenshots:

thanks for viewing, and we'll see you next time

Hello Komrad,

I bring gifts from the United Komunist Kerbal Republic (UKKR).

The Mun Bus Mk.IV:

68 Parts

~24t

2x Jr. 2x Std.

Carries up to four komrads and can make at least two trips, more if you have better pilot.

And the Mun Bus Mk. V:

70 Parts

~27t

4x Jr. 4x Std. 1x Sr.

Carries 4 komrads, lots of RCS fuel. and includes an adapter for Bullseye Station to convert one standard port into a Sr. port.

Link to files

Here is the Craft file for the Shutll-er:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ltu7j5q7655iehu/B-Tech%20Shuttl-er.craft

thnakyou again,

Btech Industries

Ladies and Gentlemen - I present tonight, for your pleasure,

The Demise Corporation's Ariel Class Medium Munar Surface-Low Munar Orbit Shuttle

Featuring:

  • 1080 gallons of onboard liquid fuel
  • 2100 units of onboard electric charge storage space - that's enough to run all the on-board lighting for a full Kerbin day!
  • Full three-dimensional RCS control, with Advanced SAS support
  • Not one, not two, not even three or four but five - yes, FIVE - regular Clamp-O-Tron ports
  • Two Clamp-O-Tron Jr docking ports
  • Sufficient Delta-V for three trips to the munar surface and back, more if flown by somebody with basic piloting ability
  • Seating space for six Kerbals
  • And all this for just 28.285 Mg and a mere 42 parts! You couldn't make it up!

Dot Craft File: http://fc04.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/181/8/c/ksp_shuttle_in_vab_by_orkykultur-d6bb7ip.png

We thank you for shopping with Demise Corporation

-Orky Kultur

THATS NO MOON base shuttle design by TheoS.

every thing needed is in the link:

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B1SAbhZWeDcYbGdZbkpIYVo4cEU&usp=sharing

the craft is made up from 48 parts and weighs a total of 37.455 mass units.

In this design there is a high fuel capacity for several shuttle missions in and out of lunar orbit with a passenger capacity of 4 but can be piloted unmanned and has 3 standard docking ports.

i spend 2 maybe 3 hours on the design, it is small and easy enough to manoeuvre with a central centre of mass and centre of thrust.

Thanks all!

TheoS.

I am real good at making little cars and what not so... tell me what to make harv..
Harv, what's next on the list of things you want for the base? I'm sure I can cook something up (even though I can't use my favorite mod, KSPX).

Harv, are you set on ep12 being the last? What if you moved a utility or two a few km's away and began some sort of outpost? That'd give you better FPS at the main base and provide missions to move things/kerbals between them. Remember you've also gotta fix the Bull's Eye station!
